name: It's Die Not Dice
description:
It's Die Not Dice is a game made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, in which contestants made games in 48 hours based off the theme, "roll of the dice," with this being my submission.

In It's Die Not Dice you play as a dice robot, 8188-Y, and depending on which side you are on you will have a different move set.

I had a lot of fun in this game jam. While I have participated in a few game jams I have never submitted one of my games, and often ignore the deadline to keep working on them for a long time. However, the strong deadline in this case helped with the creation as I needed to make more creative solutions and mechanics over lots of content, which usually makes the game more fun in my experience. Great job to Mark Brown and his team!
